item.title: [DISTRELEC-7576] BIZ - CC payments not working
item.description:
Payments with creditcard is not working.

PayPal is working. Please check why cc-payments are not working.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Wrong key were setup, now the configurat has been update so that it use euro merchent account.

Configuration was USD instead of EUR.
Fixed and changed on prod

Tested on P and works fine:
Order number: 1000166713

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7628] Update link on global page
item.description:
Hi Rene / Rafael

As you can see in the email bellow one of the reseller wants to update the link of their website on our global home page at www.distrelec.com.
Can you please setup a task and assign the frontend developer for that. The request came from Thibaud from export dep.

Thanks
Neeraj

From: FM SE export
Sent: 03 September 2015 09:41
To: Shandilya, Neeraj
Subject: FW: web site

Hi Neeraj,

One of our reseller would like to modify the link that is on www.distrelec.com to their website (see below)

Who is in charge of that?

Thanks

Thibaud

From: Peter Nagy p.nagy@teleson.be
Sent: den 3 september 2015 09:33
To: FM SE export
Subject: web site

Dear,

Could you please redirect our company on this web page :

http://www.teleson.be/en/products/components-and-interconnection/distrelec/

Best regards,

Peter NAGY
Account Manager

www.teleson.be - https://www.distrelec.biz/

TELESON Components
Rue de la Technologiestraat, 31
B-1082 Berchem-Sainte-Agathe

Tel : 32 2 482 07 15
Mob : 32 473 20 46 52
Fax : 32 2 468 15 53

VAT : 0893.389.004
IBAN : BE 04 7330 4594 9031
BIC : KREDBEBB

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
@Ruben

Can you please adjust the link

old:
http://www.teleson.be/
new:
http://www.teleson.be/en/products/components-and-interconnection/distrelec/
Please also adjust alphabetic ordering of the resellers.
fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7624] Migration - Distrelec.com - Tracking issue

Distrelec.com has no bootstrap...
<script src="//nexus.ensighten.com/distrelec/Bootstrap.js"></script>
(it is required)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

@Ruben
Can you please fix this before the deployment today.
Please test after the next deployment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7622] Migration - Distrelec.com - Country links issue
item.description:
The links are wrong, they are still the old links and while redirection works it transfers to the language specific version and then the customer cannot change the language with the interface.
for example:
https://www.elfaelektronika.pl/elfa3~pl_en/elfa/init.do?init=1&shop=ELFA_PL-PL
redirects to:
http://www.elfadistrelec.pl/?lang=en
(here the language parameter overrides the language selector and the customer will not be able to change the language)

link expected inside the page : final url without language parameter.
exemple for poland : http://www.elfadistrelec.pl/

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
@Ruben

Can you please fix this before the deployment today.
Please test after the next deployment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7620] 500 error during step 2 of checkou
item.description:
The issue is caused by a bug in com.namics.distrelec.b2b.storefront.controllers.pages.checkout.DistCheckoutReviewController.addVatWarningMessageForExportShop(Model)

because a nullpointerexception

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7618] Export - Registration & Shipping countries
item.description:
The delivry-countries are defined in HMC. This list is used for the export shop registration as well, which is not correct. In some countries exist reseller-contracts which prevent others from registering in those countries.

Therefore we have to create a blacklist in HMC which lists all countrys which should NOT be available at the registration.

Special-case: It should not be possible to add shipping addresses over the webshop which have a different country than the initial registration BUT if a shipping address with different country is coming from SAP webshop has to accept it.

Example customer with different shipping country: 726412 ID of customer in Belarus with delivery/ship to Finland. Customer number 2078027
Customer for Q(has an austrian shipping address in SAP): distrelec.testing+biz.b2b.test@gmail.com | Pwd: distrelec

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
I've added the missing countries.

What is missing is to implement a logic to filter the delivery countries configured in the base store and display only the available regisstration countries

attachment.name: Elfa Distrelec export countries in web. - registration vs configurationxlsx.xlsx
attachment.author: rburlet

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7611] Export - Order Manager
item.description:
Customer ​2183899, login trade@chip1stop.com | Pwd: elfa1234

Order Manager does not show the prices per item that customer paid.

Also Partialy Delivered orders do not give information how many units have been delivered and how many are in back order still

Open Order page lands to Error 500...
—
SP: 68

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Hi Francesco, please have a look at the openorder part, thx.

open-orders cms page was missing for export shop.
I've created it via impex and executed a catalog sync.

Not the issue is solved

This is the script i ran in production:

$contentCV=catalogVersion(catalog(id[default=$contentCatalog]),version[default='Staged'])

# These define sets of components that can fit into similar slots

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7607] Removing all outbound links from Supplier/Manufacturer Pages
item.description:
Hi David, Rene,

As an immediate and very important request from Neil (…on the basis of the obvious intention of “not sending our traffic away from our webshop”), we need to remove all outbound links from our manufacturer pages. Currently we have no control over these pages. Therefore, I hereby request that all these outbound links are removed ASAP and we are given control of the component of these manufacturer pages to enrich the content and SEO potential of these.

I thank in advance for your fast action.

Cheers,
item.summary: Removing all outbound links from Supplier/Manufacturer Pages

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
@Ruben

This is an important ticket from the marketing.
Can you please take care of it.
Important to consider all outbound links, that means not only the logo but also when a direct outbound "text link" is provided. I attach the example that Neil requested.

Please test after the next deployment.
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7596] BIZ - Checkout step 1 address issue
item.description:
​Customer 2177465 (login 554489) cannot check out at Step 1 because once customer chooses "Use billing address as shipping address", web is still asking to provide delivery address.
This was working in test system but doe snot work in life system...

Sharepoint ID: 40
Requestor: Ausra Vaisvila

—
Customer used for investigaion: dimitarr@me.com
Pwd: Distrelec2015

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Neeraj, please add the findings of our call.

We grab soap call log from server and get to know that sap is sending N1 as selected shipping condition but webshop keep continue asking to select a shipping method. 

<shippingMethods>
            <code>N1</code>
            <price>0.0</price>
            <selected>true</selected>
            <selectable>true</selectable>
   </shippingMethods>

Request

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
	<soap:Body>
	<ns2:OrderCalculationRequest
        xmlns:ns2="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris">
        <salesOrganization>7801</salesOrganization>
        <simulateOrder>true</simulateOrder>
        <customerData>
            <customerId>0002377684</customerId>
            <contactId>0000731390</contactId>
            <billingAddressId>0002377684</billingAddressId>
            <shippingAddressId>0002377684</shippingAddressId>
        </customerData>
        <orderEntries>
            <materialNumber>11035098</materialNumber>
            <quantity>1</quantity>
            <freeGiftPromotion>false</freeGiftPromotion>
        </orderEntries>
        <orderEntries>
            <materialNumber>11035099</materialNumber>
            <quantity>1</quantity>
            <freeGiftPromotion>false</freeGiftPromotion>
        </orderEntries>
        <selectedPaymentMethodCode>Z017</selectedPaymentMethodCode>
        <selectedShippingMethodCode>N1</selectedShippingMethodCode>
        <freeShippingPromotion>false</freeShippingPromotion>
        <editableByAllContacts>false</editableByAllContacts>
    </ns2:OrderCalculationRequest>
	</soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

Response

<SOAP:Envelope xmlns:SOAP="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
   <SOAP:Header/>
   <SOAP:Body>
      <ns1:OrderCalculationResponse xmlns:ns1="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris">
         <orderEntries>
            <materialNumber>11035098</materialNumber>
            <orderQuantity>1</orderQuantity>
            <freeGiftPromotion>false</freeGiftPromotion>
            <listPrice>7.26</listPrice>
            <listPriceTotal>7.26</listPriceTotal>
            <actualPrice>7.26</actualPrice>
            <actualPriceTotal>7.26</actualPriceTotal>
            <availabilityInfo>
               <availableQuantity>0</availableQuantity>
               <estimatedDeliveryDate>20150901</estimatedDeliveryDate>
            </availabilityInfo>
            <availabilityInfo>
               <availableQuantity>1</availableQuantity>
               <estimatedDeliveryDate>20150904</estimatedDeliveryDate>
            </availabilityInfo>
         </orderEntries>
         <orderEntries>
            <materialNumber>11035099</materialNumber>
            <orderQuantity>1</orderQuantity>
            <freeGiftPromotion>false</freeGiftPromotion>
            <listPrice>7.66</listPrice>
            <listPriceTotal>7.66</listPriceTotal>
            <actualPrice>7.66</actualPrice>
            <actualPriceTotal>7.66</actualPriceTotal>
            <availabilityInfo>
               <availableQuantity>0</availableQuantity>
               <estimatedDeliveryDate>20150901</estimatedDeliveryDate>
            </availabilityInfo>
            <availabilityInfo>
               <availableQuantity>1</availableQuantity>
               <estimatedDeliveryDate>20150904</estimatedDeliveryDate>
            </availabilityInfo>
         </orderEntries>
         <paymentMethods>
            <code>WB01</code>
            <price>0.0</price>
            <selected>false</selected>
            <selectable>true</selectable>
         </paymentMethods>
         <paymentMethods>
            <code>Z017</code>
            <price>0.0</price>
            <selected>true</selected>
            <selectable>true</selectable>
         </paymentMethods>
         <paymentMethods>
            <code>WB01</code>
            <price>0.0</price>
            <selected>false</selected>
            <selectable>true</selectable>
         </paymentMethods>
         <paymentMethods>
            <code>WB03</code>
            <price>0.0</price>
            <selected>false</selected>
            <selectable>true</selectable>
         </paymentMethods>
         <shippingMethods>
            <code>A1</code>
            <price>0.0</price>
            <selected>false</selected>
         </shippingMethods>
         <shippingMethods>
            <code>E1</code>
            <price>0.0</price>
            <selected>false</selected>
            <selectable>true</selectable>
         </shippingMethods>
         <shippingMethods>
            <code>N1</code>
            <price>0.0</price>
            <selected>true</selected>
            <selectable>true</selectable>
         </shippingMethods>
         <subtotal1>14.92</subtotal1>
         <subtotal2>14.92</subtotal2>
         <tax>0.0</tax>
         <total>14.92</total>
      </ns1:OrderCalculationResponse>
   </SOAP:Body>
</SOAP:Envelope>

Hi Francesco, could you check what is wrong here? Could that be related to the pickup issues as error on shop says to select a shipping / pickup location nevertheless this is already selected & present.
Bulgaria was missing in site configuration. This prevented the address of being used.
Waiting on complete list of countries to be configured.

List of countries have been attached to http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-7491?focusedCommentId=44306&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-44306

This ticket and DISTRELEC-7491 are about the same now.

I've implemented a custom message in case the customer does not belong to a country that is configured as delivery country in the base store configuration.
The property that needs to be translated is the follwing:

checkout.deliveryAddress.delivyCountryInvalid = At the moment it is not possible to deliver in your country. Please contact customer service..

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7592] URL forwarding error
item.description: The Export shop has an error in the redirection: the old start page url http://www.elfaelectronics.com/elfa3~ex_en/elfa/init.do?init=1&shop=ELFA_EX-EN redirects to http://www.distrelec.comhttp//www.distrelec.com/global which of course renders a NAME_NOT_RESOLVED error.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: done, please test after deploy.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7590] Import List Tool - Import with error stops the cart calculation (price/availability)
item.description:
The import list tool imports all the items however if some items are not sellable in this Country (depending on the sales Status) and are not being removed from the list before adding it to the cart it will block the calculation of the cart (Prices and Availability).

e.g. 01.09.15: article 14475035 in distrelec.biz

Here two examples:

  • The russian customer imported lots of articles (96) with the "Import List" (see attached "order from RU of E-051 (2).xlsx") in the russian Export site - Login details: 554489, pass: elfapass
  • Only the first 3 have a Price displayed instead of all of them (see printscreen).
  • If the customer wants to checkout anyway, an error message will be written "Could not recalculate Cart. Try again in a few minutes.". Might be related to the missing Prices.

Same with
customer 2186417, login 775081.
Issues:
1. List uploaded from excel into shopping cart does not consist any prices. Customer has special reseller prices as well as previous customer 2177465 where we have the same issue.
2.not possible to proceed as system does not make recalculation.
3. Also it does not give availability indication. Just says "Loading.."

To Do
Can we add an error message for the Import tool, say way I guess that we handle articles that we don't regonize as being in our assortment?
item.summary: Import List Tool - Import with error stops the cart calculation (price/availability)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi,
I was able to add all products to the cart except two of them (16021967 and 14475035) which does not have any price. I checked the 7801 price files received from SAP and these two articles were not in. So the problem is coming from SAP.
Hi Nabil, the Price is in the HMC, look at russian issue "13317366 prices in hmc.png" or should it come from the Interface?

the prices are also visible on the product detail page: http://www.distrelec.biz/en/fuse-20-mm-fast-blow-sp-schurter-0001-1007/p/13317366

You can also add it to the cart without problem.
Hi Nabil, wrongly Displayed, it's about sales Status not Price.

Hi David,
I implemented the check if product is buyable and remove it from the matching list.

BR,
/Nabil.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7552] Evo-Payment merchant configuration per country and currency
item.description:
For the export shop and for Sweden we need to be able to have a different merchant-id, hmac and blowfish per currency.

I've configured the export shop with the merchant for EUR.
So if someone will try to to a credit card payment with USD he will get an error.
item.summary: Evo-Payment merchant configuration per country and currency

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
@Neeraj

Can you please immediately take care of this.

Hi Rene,

I have started analysis for this task and I will start writing code for this soon. In my opinion it can take 2 days of development and 1 day in testing. since we will change the very basic behavior. I see the complex of this in case of notification a bit higher as we don't have any session in case of notify so that we can decide for which currency the notification request has came so find merchent account etc. I am on it and will start implementation soon.

Branch http://svn.distrelec.com/repositories/Distrelec-Relaunch-2012-intern/branches/v4.0-multipleMerchantIds

has been created and code has been checked-In whatever has been done so far.
created new branch for this topic: http://svn.distrelec.com/repositories/Distrelec-Relaunch-2012-intern/branches/v4.0-multipleMerchantIds
Will is busy with price correction on P so I took it over.
Development has been done. We are ready for testing

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7527] Values not aligned
item.description:
Hello Ruben

We have realized that on product detail page, beneath the tab Product Details, the values from the attributes are not aligned. This is the case on P and Q.

http://test.distrelec.ch/en/xy-combination-100-nf-275-vac-kemet-pzb300mc13r30/p/16564942?q=821675&page=1&origPos=1&origPageSize=50&simi=99.5#

http://www.distrelec.ch/en/xy-combination-100-nf-275-vac-kemet-pzb300mc13r30/p/16564942?q=821675&page=1&origPos=1&origPageSize=50&simi=99.5

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7516] Show more languages button doesn't work
item.description:
Hi all,
Open a product, go to section "Downloads", click on button "Show more languages" will redirect to start page of the shop.

Check e.g.:
http://www.distrelec.ch/en/panel-mounting-base-phoenix-contact-hc-evo-b06-bws-plrbk/p/11072056?q=119782&page=1&origPos=1&origPageSize=25&simi=99.8

http://www.distrelec.ch/en/construction-adhesive-50-ml-3m-epx-dp460-50ml/p/11041231?q=glue&page=1&origPos=1&origPageSize=25&simi=100.0

Tested with several OS and web browsers.
item.summary: Show more languages button doesn't work

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: reproducable on Q.

Hi Ruben

As discussed its a FE issue.

Thx
Will
please test after the next deployment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7466] 2 customers are not able to add products to the cart
item.description:
Infos from Zisan Merter:

User 1

  • user: p.wagner@ektronic.de
  • passwort: distrelec2015

User 2

browser:

  • Chrome: 44.0.2403.130m
  • mozilla: 40.0.2T
  • mozilla Version 3903
item.summary: 2 customers are not able to add products to the cart

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: customers cant add products to the cart at all

User 2 (B2C)

  • User: george.briner@polarion.com
  • password: distrelec2015
    ERP Contact ID: 1248312

the customer has allowed to use his login... Please don´t proceed accidently an order.

Hi Zisan

Can you ask the user using chrome to give us the list of all activated extensions in his browser?

We can not reproduce it with the browser version only. We think they have some special settings in the browser which maybe blocks java script.

Thx
Will
attached in word the firefox extensions of our B2C Customer --> mozilla Version 3903
I can reproduce the problem now with firefox 3903 and ghostery addon. This addon can block webtrekk and if configured like this, you cant add products to the cart.

Hi Angel

We have many customers in germany, who cant add products to the cart. Can we disable webtrekk for the add to cart function? It would solve this issue.

Thx
Will

Since we din't get a feedback and add2cart is more important than tracking.
We will remove the event tracking of the add2cart for now.

@Will
Please remove the tracking.
Please also check for other event tracking of webtrekk and remove them as well.
Thank you...

@Francesco

Will is not here, can you please take car of it.

Add to Cart tracking has been removed.

Please test after the next deployment.
Hi Zisan, this should be fixed in production with the rollout from the 31st of august on. Please inform the customer and let us know if it works in production thanks.

@Zisan

There have been some other tickets regarding this problem.
Some of them where also reported by you so I guess you should also inform those customers.
Unfortunately the other tickets are not yet linked to this, if you need we can help you to search for the those tickets.

Hi Rene,
the customers with the cart problem are daily more. Can you deploy this ticket today?
Between the customers we have many important Key account customers.

Hello Zisan

Unfortunately we cannot do this right now.

We are all working to prepare the rollout for this weekend
and we don't have time and resources to do a hotfix deployment and the testing for a production release.
So you will have to wait until the deployment this Friday (28.8.15).
This ticket belongs to a pre-release-candidate - Please test immediately in order to have possible bugs fixed until the Golive. Thanks!

@Will

Can you please test that on TEST with you plugin.
HI i have called one of our customers that can put items to the cart. He has still the same issue. please control it again.

@Will

Please check immediately!
I will check it now.
reproducable on P. On Q its working sporadically...
found out that "buy now" buttons on start page www.distrelec.de are working even if you block webtrekk.

ticket was committed to trunk and not to the branch, we check now if this is the problem.
-> same code level, this is not the problem

buy now button on P works! maybe we can implement the same button logic for the detail page and the all the other places.

http://jira.distrelec.com/secure/attachment/20018/screenshot-buynow-button-works.png

Hi Ruben

Check my last comment. This is maybe a quick possible solution. What do you think?

Thx
Will

I did some changes to (try to) avoid some calls to webtrekk. But I don't know how this plugins work inside...

Note that the use of this kind of plugins can screw up some website functionalities (Not only distrelec web):

"Blocking tracking can sometimes screw up the way webpages load unnecessarily" (http://www.digitaltrends.com/web/do-not-track-plus-vs-ghostery/)
Can you completely remove all the event tracking for web-track?

All click events tracking have been removed from webtrekk.js.

We should create another ticket to refactor the tracking.
Specially for the Add to Cart: Tracking MUST be done after the Add to Cart action is finished. Never before.

We should create another ticket to refactor the tracking.

Yes please create a ticket.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7436] OCI Honeywell Schweiz - Problems with special characters
item.description:
Von: customercare customercare@hubwoo.com
Gesendet: Dienstag, 11. August 2015 16:22
An: Bertoldo, Massimo
Betreff: Ticket 30441380: EU HMP: Special characters < or >

Hallo Herr Bertoldo,

Von Ihrem Kunden Honeywell haben wir erfahren das Spezielle Buchstaben oder Zeichen nicht richtig angezeigt werden uns somit Probleme in deren System auftreten.

Ich beziehe mich auf den Punchout Distrelec Switzerland.

Zum Beispiel hätten wir da den Artikel 199572.

Der Artikel wird dann als „Patchkabel RJ45 Cat.6<sub>A</sub> S/FTP“ bei der Warenübergabe angezeigt, und nicht als „Patchkabel RJ45 Cat.6A S/FTP 3 m Grün, PB-SFTP6A-3-GN, Maxxtro“.

Das “A“ verursacht hierbei Probleme. Könnten Sie dieses und ähnliche Buchstaben oder Sonderzeichen auf Wunsch von Honeywell entfernen?

Bitte geben Sie mir eine kurze Rückmeldung.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen,

Heiko Paraiso
Global Customer Services - Analyst
______________________________________________
Hubwoo Global Customer Support

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7074] Encoding problem in shopping list
item.description: Wrong encoding of "apostroph" (see image)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
@Nitin

Can you please take care of this.

Hi Rene,

Can you please provide test user credentials.

Thanks,
Nitin

The list of test accounts:

http://wiki.distrelec.com/display/distrelint/Test+Accounts

Problem comes right after the recalculation (Ajax call).
If you refresh after that, problem dissapears.
I can't reproduce it locally.
Nabil Benothman | Distrelec:
I need the Base.js file not-minified on Test

Hi Nitin,

it looks the Back End is providing the price in a weird format, as you can see in the screenshot.

To reproduce the issue:

  • Go to the shopping list.
  • Increase the quantity of one of the products to get a high price (CHF XX,XXX).
  • Click on Recalculate: This will trigger the Ajax call to update the price.

Note: If at this point you refresh the whole page, the price will be OK.

Hi Ruben,

The problem is inside the tag called. The backend is always giving the same price object irrespective of language.
here is the location of the tag file /distrelecB2Bstorefront/web/webroot/WEB-INF/tags/shared/terrific/format/price.tag 

<format:price format="price" priceData="${shoppingList.totalPrice}" />

I just saw and found the json object is calling this tag to format the price before send it.
Please test after the next deployment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7039] Delivery address validation "Packstation"
item.description:
Requirement

  • Germany ONLY: If the word "Packstation" / "packstation" appears in the shipping address, the address cannot be saved/used for checkout unless this is changed.
  • A warning should be shown to the customer: ""

Open Points:

  1. Warning message should be defined by business.
  2. Business needs to define which fields of the Address form need to be validated.
  3. Needs this to be implemented for other countries as well? If yes, translations of the warning and "Packstation" are needed.

Ticket originates from: DSUP-597

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Hi Zisan, Could you please come up with answers to the open points? Thanks.

Hi Rafael,
the requirement is from Mirco Saager, i don´t know the details, Mirco is on vacation.

Hi Rafael,

now i have an answer:
Warning Message should be :

DE: Ein Versand an eine Packstation/Postfilliale ist leider nicht möglich. Bitte korrigieren Sie Ihre Anschrift.
EN: Unfortunately we cannot deliver to a Packstation/Postoffice. Please correct your address.

The following field should be checked for the Value “Packstation” or “packstation” or “Postfiliale” or “postfiliale” (see attachment field name)

Other Countries :
Verified in telephone Call with DHL-Service on 22.06.2015 there are no European Countries having Packstation-Service available.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen

i.A. Mirco Saager
Leitung Service

Hi Oana,
Mirco asked me for the status of this ticket.

Hi rene,
can you please help me with this ticket? Its open since June...

@Akshay

Can you please take care of this.
can you please confirm is this applicable for Swiss -German as well.
This is only for the country Germany, so not relevant for Switzerland and Swiss-German.
Committed the required changes.Please test after next deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6553] PAYID in EVO Payments
item.description:
In the interface we are trying to built with the EVO payments came up that we need the PayID information that today is held only on the HMC side and is not passed to SAP.

In order for EVOpayments to be able to match the capture request we are trying to complete with the initial Authorize call from the Webshop we need to pass this information also in the ERP side.

That means that interface IF 11 needs to be updated with a new field PayID. It should go into SAP-Field: FPLTC-RTEXT

See specification here: http://wiki.distrelec.com/display/distrelint/IF-11+Order+Calculation

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Specification was updated yesterday to the correct one.

Hi Rafael,

The fix has been apply, but before we test it into Q system, Sap team needs to push there changes into SAP-Q system.
Changes from SAP side should be present.
The problem was compair of enum value with a string. That has been fixed.

=> Not ready for ELFA SEO/SEM/Affiliation migration to hybris

Update :

  • Products redirections (ht access rule : ok) :
    • https://www.elfaelektronikk.no/elfa3~no_en/elfa/init.do?item=80-634-23 need to be redirected in 301 to http://www.distrelec.ch/de/fraeser-ve-pc-dremel-114/p/18063423

  • Families redirections (ht access rule : nok) :

=> Not ready for ELFA SEO/SEM/Affiliation migration to hybris

Hi Pièrre,
Attached you will find the list with matching families from PIM and from Elfa SAP (famid_pimid.xls).

Kinds, Patrick

Patrick,
I checked the id, it match properly (example : elfa => hybris).
I found some exception, I guess it's a fluctuation of categories reason (404, 500...).
@Francesco : As discussed, here is the file with the matching of domain for the redirection router.
@Francesco : I didn't precise assuming hybris 301 fallback to the homepage would work by default, but to confirm, if an url is not matching any of the rules it must be redirected to the homepage.

Hi Pierre,
I've implemented the redirection rules. they will be available with the next deploy only in PRODUCTION and only after the DNS switch.

Can we discuss together about the default redirection?

Additionally, do you think it would make sense to restrict all of these redirection for elfa products, families and categories ONLY for googlebot?

Ok, I pass by to your desk.

No, it doesn't make sense to limit it to googlebot, the migration is needed for everyone.

Hi Pierre
as discussed you can find here the production configuration i've implemented:

### start ticket DISTRELEC-6420
# creating the right host based on the path content
SetEnvIf Request_URI "^/elfa3~se_([a-z]{2})" ELFA_HOST=www.elfa.se/$1
SetEnvIf Request_URI "^/elfa3~dk_([a-z]{2})" ELFA_HOST=www.elfadistrelec.dk/$1
SetEnvIf Request_URI "^/elfa3~ee_([a-z]{2})" ELFA_HOST=www.elfadistrelec.ee/$1
SetEnvIf Request_URI "^/elfa3~lv_([a-z]{2})" ELFA_HOST=www.elfadistrelec.lv/$1
SetEnvIf Request_URI "^/elfa3~lt_([a-z]{2})" ELFA_HOST=www.distrelec.lt/$1
SetEnvIf Request_URI "^/elfa3~eu_([a-z]{2})" ELFA_HOST=www.distrelec.biz/$1
SetEnvIf Request_URI "^/elfa3~no_([a-z]{2})" ELFA_HOST=www.elfadistrelec.no/$1
SetEnvIf Request_URI "^/elfa3~fi_([a-z]{2})" ELFA_HOST=www.elfadistrelec.fi/$1
SetEnvIf Request_URI "^/elfa3~nl_([a-z]{2})" ELFA_HOST=www.distrelec.nl/$1
SetEnvIf Request_URI "^/elfa3~pl_([a-z]{2})" ELFA_HOST=www.elfadistrelec.pl/$1
SetEnvIf Request_URI "^/elfa3~ex_([a-z]{2})" ELFA_HOST=www.distrelec.biz/$1

#product redirection
RewriteCond %{env:ELFA_HOST} !^$
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_URI}<>%{QUERY_STRING} ^/elfa3~se_([a-z]{2})\/elfa\/init\.do<>.*item=([0-9]{2})-([0-9]{3})-([0-9]{2}).*$
RewriteRule .* http://%{env:ELFA_HOST}/%1/p/%2%3%4? [R=301,L]

#family redirection
RewriteMap elfafamily txt:/etc/httpd/conf.d/rewrite_maps/elfa_family_view_map.txt
RewriteCond %{env:ELFA_HOST} !^$
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} (?:^|&)sq=famid([0-9]{6})
RewriteCond ${elfafamily:%1} >""
RewriteRule ^/(.*) http://%{env:ELFA_HOST}/${elfafamily:%1|}? [R=301,L]

#category redirection
RewriteMap elfacategory txt:/etc/httpd/conf.d/rewrite_maps/elfa_category_view_map.txt
RewriteCond %{env:ELFA_HOST} !^$
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} (?:^|&)toc=([0-9]{6})
RewriteCond ${elfafamily:%1} >""
RewriteRule ^/(.*) http://%{env:ELFA_HOST}/${elfafamily:%1|}? [R=301,L]

# default elfa redirection to the new url
RewriteCond %{env:ELFA_HOST} !^$
RewriteRule ^/(.*) http://%{env:ELFA_HOST}? [R=301,L]

# end ticket DISTRELEC-6420

Additionally you can test these rule in the test system by changing the local machine hosts file in this way:

Hi Pierre
now you can test the rules in Q, they should finally work.

  • http://test.distrelec.no/elfa3~no_en/elfa/init.do?item=80-634-23&toc=19617

Issue with firewall and escaped parameter is now fixed

Hi Francesco, after a manual crawl of 50k of url on elfa poland and test of the url on Q, here is the review :

  • item : OK work in 100% of the case
  • toc :OK work in 75% of the case (problem are for toc id not inside file, so homepage is normal behavior)
  • famid : NOK, work in 10% of the case
    Exemples not working (with famid inside file)
    • http://test.distrelec.no/elfa3~no_no/elfa/init.do?sq=famid99203
    • http://test.distrelec.no/elfa3~no_no/elfa/init.do?sq=famid65553
    • http://test.distrelec.no/elfa3~no_no/elfa/init.do?sq=famid74148
    • http://test.distrelec.no/elfa3~no_no/elfa/init.do?sq=famid103706
    • http://test.distrelec.no/elfa3~no_no/elfa/init.do?sq=famid70441

The problem was because of this issue: DISTRELEC-7553
Now is fixed

you can try again!

Last check :

  • item : OK ready for production
  • toc :OK ready for production
  • famid : OK ready for production

Ready for P !

Manual check on P seems ok.

I need log export of the last 3 days to check the errors.

List of issues :

  • 0) Critical - http://www.elfaelectronics.com/elfa3~ex_en/elfa/init.do?init=1&shop=ELFA_EX-EN =301> http://www.distrelec.comhttp//www.distrelec.com/global
    It need to be rewritten to https://www.distrelec.biz/ in 301.
  • 1) Critical - Wrong http status when the origin url is http (302 instead of 301) :
    Exemple : http://www.elfa.se/elfa3~lv_lv/elfa/init.do?init=1&shop=ELFA_LV-LV =302> https://www.elfa.se/elfa3~lv_lv/elfa/init.do?init=1&shop=ELFA_LV-LV =301> https://www.elfadistrelec.lv/
    Behavior expected : http://www.elfa.se/elfa3~lv_lv/elfa/init.do?init=1&shop=ELFA_LV-LV =301> https://www.elfa.se/elfa3~lv_lv/elfa/init.do?init=1&shop=ELFA_LV-LV =301> https://www.elfadistrelec.lv/
  • 2) Critical - http://www.elfaelectronics.com/ =302> http://www.distrelec.com/
    Behavior expected : http://www.elfaelectronics.com/ =301> http://www.distrelec.com/
  • 3) Blocker - Some categories redirections are not handled as expected :
    Exemple : https://www.elfaelektronika.pl/elfa3~PL_PL/elfa/init.do?toc=19217&name=oprawki_do_zarowek (cached version by google|http://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?sourceid=chrome-psyapi2&ion=1&ie=UTF-8&q=cache%3Ahttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.elfaelektronika.pl%2Felfa3~PL_PL%2Felfa%2Finit.do%3Ftoc%3D19217%26name%3Doprawki_do_zarowek&oq=cac&aqs=chrome.0.69i59j69i65l3j69i57j69i59.1471j0j7&bav=on.2,or.r_cp.&biw=1920&bih=1115&dpr=1&ech=1&psi=U0TkVdbKKcassgGEoaHADA.1441023060284.3&ei=U0TkVdbKKcassgGEoaHADA&emsg=NCSR&noj=1] =301> homepage.
    This category is inside the matching file and is expected to be redirected to http://www.elfadistrelec.pl/c/cat-16573.
    More toc id with faulty redirect examples : 19911, 18816, 19216, 20525, 19349...
    (this problem happen in 50% of the category cases, the rest of the time it's correctly redirected)
  • 4) Blocker - Some product redirections are not handeled as expected :
    https://www.elfaelektronika.pl/elfa3~PL_PL/elfa/init.do?item=42-047-15&toc=0&q=famid76416 (cached)=301> http://www.elfadistrelec.pl/?notFound=true
    Expected redirection http://www.elfadistrelec.pl/pl/p/14204715
    More item id with faulty redirect examples : 42-690-49, 44-179-27, 48-330-69, 70-039-32, 69-908-08 ... (all supposed to redirect to their existing hybris equivalent)
    (this problem happen in 20% of the product redirection cases, the rest of the time it's correctly redirected)
  • 5) - Critical - Larger sample of 302 fautly redirection to change into 301
    https://www.diffnow.com/?report=rto0v

As seen with Francesco :

  • 0) Searching for a fix
  • 1) 302 still there. Normally fixed tomorrow.
  • 2) Fixed
  • 3 & 4) Case insensitive on the language parameters. Fix coming during the week.
  • 5) elfaelectronics.com case corrected in 301, the 114 other url are still in 302.

• 0) Fixed
  • 1) Not fixed
  • 2) Fixed
  • 3) Fixed
  • 4) Fixed
  • 5) Fixed for 90% of the case. Not fixed for elfaelectronics.com/elfa3/StartPage.do (a new ticket should be built for cms 302 issues pages (it's not related to this rollout)
